page.title: 10Housing in Alvechurch.
page.content: In Alvechurch we have an assortment of different houses, old, new, historic, mock Tudor, detached, terraced, semi detached, bungalows and maisonettes. These are spread all over Alvechurch, and some older houses are 3 storey buildings. The historic buildings are the Fish and Chip shop, Prettys the Baker, and we also have 29 listed buildings. One of the listed buildings is the "Old House" at the top of Bear Hill, a Tudor house which Shakespeare is said to have visited. A few estate houses are council properties, but most are privately owned. People with special needs are catered for. One house in Snake Lane is home for few women living in the community.
